name: @web4/user
description: Web4 User component for consistent user identification

scripts.preinstall: echo 'Run npm run build first to compile TypeScript lifecycle tools'
scripts.postinstall: npm run build && npm run symlink
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run check:deps
scripts.fresh-build: npm run clean && npm run install-and-build
scripts.postbuild: npm run verify && npm run generate:docs
scripts.check:deps: node dist/ts/layer5/LifecycleCLI.js check-dependencies || echo 'Skipping dependency check - build in progress'
scripts.start: echo 'User component - use the user script in scripts directory'
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A dist
